hero.title: Your Partner in IT Innovation
hero.subtitle: Explore the hubs below and discover solutions tailored to your business needs.

networkHubPage.title: Network Hub
networkHubPage.intro: Empowering organizations to build agile, intelligent, and future-ready networks that connect people, data, and applications — with unmatched performance and reliability.
networkHubPage.introParagraph: The Network Hub empowers organizations to design, build, and operate high performance infrastructures that connect people, applications, and data with speed and reliability. We deliver enterprise-grade LAN, WAN, and data center architectures that integrate automation, visibility, and cloud-ready scalability at every layer. By leveraging the latest Software-Defined Networking (SDN) frameworks, we enable centralized control, faster provisioning, and consistent policy across physical and virtual domains. Our engineers blend modern SDN fabrics with proven routing and switching design to create networks that are adaptive, secure, and future-proof. From enterprise campuses to global hybrid clouds, Stackhubs networks are built to perform intelligently, efficiently, and without compromise.

sections.title: Enterprise Networks & Smart Campus Solutions
sections.desc: We design and deploy enterprise network infrastructures that combine wired, wireless, and identity-driven access into a unified fabric. Our solutions deliver high availability, scalable segmentation, and deep visibility across all user and device types. We implement Cisco Software-Defined Access (SDA) to bring automation and policy consistency to campus environments, and extend it through multisite capabilities for unified management across distributed locations. The result is a secure, intelligent enterprise network that provides seamless mobility, zero-touch provisioning, and centralized operations across every site.

sections.title: Data Center & Cloud Fabric
sections.desc: Modern workloads demand agility, security, and automation and our data center networking delivers all three. We design spine-leaf fabrics with EVPN/VXLAN overlays, delivering scalability, multi-tenant segmentation, and low-latency performance. Our data center framework integrates Cisco Application Centric Infrastructure (ACI) for policy-based automation, including Multipod and Multisite designs managed through NDO and analyzed with NDI for end-to-end visibility. We connect on-premises data centers with hybrid and multi-cloud environments seamlessly, ensuring consistent policy enforcement and optimized traffic flow wherever your workloads run.

sections.title: SD-WAN & Multi-Site Connectivity
sections.desc: We modernize WAN architectures with intelligent, application-aware routing and simplified management. Our SD-WAN solutions enhance cloud performance, security, and cost efficiency across multiple carriers and geographies. We deliver Cisco SD-WAN for enterprise-scale control and segmentation, Meraki SD-WAN for agile, cloud-managed simplicity, and integrate VMware VeloCloud and Fortinet SD-WAN where edge flexibility or unified security is key. Every deployment is engineered for high availability, optimized user experience, and centralized visibility through advanced analytics and orchestration.

sections.title: Network Automation & Orchestration
sections.desc: Automation drives speed, accuracy, and operational excellence. We build automation frameworks that standardize configuration, accelerate rollout, and ensure compliance using model-driven templates, APIs, and orchestration tools. Our SDN-ready automation workflows cover provisioning, policy management, performance assurance, and lifecycle operations reducing human error and improving reliability. With Stackhubs automation, your network becomes truly intent-based: responsive, self-optimizing, and easy to scale.

sections.title: Security Integration & Zero-Trust Alignment
sections.desc: Every Stackhubs network is designed with built-in security. Our architectures integrate seamlessly with the InfoSec Hub, aligning advanced network segmentation, identity enforcement, and zero-trust principles from edge to core. We combine real-time visibility, encrypted traffic analytics, and automated response mechanisms to ensure continuous protection without performance trade-offs. The result: a unified ecosystem where networking and security operate as one.

sections.title: Performance & Observability
sections.desc: Visibility is the foundation of reliability. We embed telemetry, flow analytics, and AI-driven monitoring tools that track every packet and path in real time. Through continuous analysis and predictive insights, we identify bottlenecks, optimize routing, and fine-tune QoS policies to guarantee a consistent user experience. Our observability platforms integrate directly with your SDN controllers and performance systems keeping the network healthy, fast, and always aligned with business priorities.

networkHubPage.ctaSubtitle: Discover how StackHubs can help you build a smarter, faster, and more secure digital foundation.

infoSecHubPage.title: InfoSec Hub
infoSecHubPage.intro: Building secure, resilient digital ecosystems across the MENA region.
infoSecHubPage.introParagraph: In an era of constant digital expansion, cybersecurity is no longer a reactive function — it is a core component of business continuity and trust. The InfoSec Hub at Stackhubs delivers end-to-end security architecture, operations, and assurance services that protect critical assets across infrastructure, applications, and cloud environments. We help organizations establish governance frameworks, implement defense-in-depth strategies, and maintain operational resilience through continuous monitoring and proactive threat response. Our security practice integrates seamlessly with all other hubs, ensuring protection is embedded at every layer — from connectivity and access to data and workloads. Through industry best practices, automation, and regional compliance alignment, we help clients in the MENA region achieve robust, auditable, and adaptive security postures built for today’s evolving threat landscape.

sections.title: Cybersecurity Architecture & Governance
sections.desc: We develop holistic security architectures that align with your business goals and regulatory requirements. Our experts map every control layer — network, cloud, application, and identity — into a unified policy framework built on Zero Trust, NIST, and ISO 27001 principles. We design governance models that clearly define responsibilities, escalation paths, and compliance metrics, ensuring your operations stay auditable and secure. Through this architecture, organizations gain clarity, consistency, and confidence across all security domains.

sections.title: Threat Detection & Incident Response (SOC / SOAR)
sections.desc: Stackhubs builds and operates Security Operations Centers (SOC) that combine human expertise with AI-driven analytics. We deploy and fine-tune SIEM and SOAR platforms to detect anomalies, correlate logs, and automate containment or remediation within seconds. Our incident response playbooks integrate directly with network, cloud, and endpoint systems, ensuring coordinated action across all layers. This enables your teams to transition from reactive defense to proactive threat hunting — minimizing impact and accelerating recovery.

sections.title: Identity & Access Management (IAM / PAM)
sections.desc: We help organizations secure digital identities through centralized authentication, authorization, and privilege control. Our implementations include Identity Governance (IGA), Single Sign-On (SSO), Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), and Privileged Access Management (PAM) solutions. We integrate with existing directory services and cloud identity providers to maintain seamless access for users while enforcing strict least-privilege and just-in-time access models. The result is a consistent, traceable, and secure identity ecosystem across every platform and application.

sections.title: Network & Cloud Security
sections.desc: We deliver unified security across on-premises, hybrid, and cloud environments to ensure consistent visibility and control. Our engineers design layered protection using Next-Generation Firewalls (NGFW), Intrusion Prevention Systems (IPS), and Web Application Firewalls (WAF) integrated with Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) and Workload Protection Platforms (CWPP). We secure cloud-native workloads, containers, and APIs while enforcing segmentation and encrypted traffic analytics across the network. Through tight integration with the Network Hub, we ensure that every connection, workload, and user operates within a protected, policy-driven framework. This holistic approach provides unified threat visibility and control from the data center to the public cloud.

sections.title: Governance, Risk & Compliance (GRC)
sections.desc: Our GRC practice ensures that cybersecurity is embedded within organizational governance, not treated as a separate function. We help enterprises in the Middle East and North Africa achieve regulatory alignment and maintain continuous compliance across national and sector-specific frameworks. Our consultants implement structured governance models, clear risk ownership, and measurable control maturity programs tailored to each client’s environment. We align with ISO 27001, NCA ECC (Saudi Arabia), DESC / ADQCC (UAE), and NTRA Cyber Framework (Egypt) while mapping them to global standards such as NIST and CIS. The team conducts risk assessments, control gap analyses, and policy audits, ensuring accountability from board level to technical operations. Through awareness programs and executive reporting, we build a culture of compliance that strengthens resilience and decision-making. The outcome is a transparent, auditable, and trusted cybersecurity posture that satisfies regulators and enhances business confidence.

sections.title: Penetration Testing & Assessment Services
sections.desc: Our StackHubs red-team specialists conduct comprehensive penetration testing to identify vulnerabilities before attackers can exploit them. We perform network, web application, wireless, and social engineering assessments, simulating real-world attacks to validate your defenses. In addition, our vulnerability management programs prioritize and remediate risks based on exploitability and business impact. Each engagement concludes with a detailed technical and executive report outlining findings, remediation paths, and long-term hardening recommendations. These services provide both assurance and actionable insights to maintain a continuously improving defense posture.
